sweets.name: Gulab Jamun
sweets.description: Deep-fried dough balls soaked in sugary syrup flavored with cardamom and rose water.

sweets.name: Jalebi
sweets.description: A popular sweet made by deep-frying batter in circular shapes and soaking them in sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Ladoo
sweets.description: A round-shaped sweet made from flour and sugar, often served during festivals.

sweets.name: Barfi
sweets.description: A dense, milk-based sweet, often garnished with pistachios or almonds.

sweets.name: Rasgulla
sweets.description: Soft, spongy balls made of chhena, soaked in sweet syrup flavored with rose water.

sweets.name: Kaju Katli
sweets.description: A smooth, diamond-shaped sweet made from cashew nuts and sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Peda
sweets.description: A milk-based sweet with a dense, chewy texture, flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts.

sweets.name: Mysore Pak
sweets.description: A rich, buttery sweet made from gram flour, sugar, and ghee.

sweets.name: Ras Malai
sweets.description: Creamy, spongy discs made from chhena soaked in sweetened milk and flavored with saffron.

sweets.name: Sooji Halwa
sweets.description: A warm, sweet semolina pudding cooked with ghee, sugar, and garnished with nuts.

sweets.name: Imarti
sweets.description: A traditional Indian sweet similar to Jalebi, made from urad dal flour and soaked in sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Chamcham
sweets.description: Chewy, sweet rolls made from paneer, soaked in sugar syrup flavored with rose water.

sweets.name: Feni
sweets.description: A fermented sweet drink made from cashews, typically consumed during festivals.

sweets.name: Kulfi
sweets.description: A dense, frozen dairy dessert flavored with cardamom, saffron, and garnished with pistachios.

sweets.name: Pineapple Sheera
sweets.description: A fruity, warm semolina pudding made with pineapple, sugar, and ghee.
